name: Candy Ball (Anvilhand)
description:
Candy Ball is the first project release from Anvilhand Interactive - an independent interactive media development company.

Rules are simple. You roll the candy ball (with your keyboard or with a gamepad compatible with Xinput driver) , collect as many pumpkins as possible, try not to fall, and finish the course within 60 seconds.

You can dash, jump and break to help you finish the levels while rolling through obstacles.

In order to help you get better scores we built a ghost ball feature so that you could replay the levels you finish in order to get a higher score while tracking your best.

Multiplayer section is currently under development. We are planning to have hotseat session for 4players and network play within an arena style gameplay.
